00030 
00031 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LFSCK
00032 
00033 #include <lu_object.h>
00034 #include <dt_object.h>
00035 #include <lustre_fid.h>
00036 #include <lustre/lustre_user.h>
00037 
00038 #include "lfsck_internal.h"
00039 
00040 #define LFSCK_BOOKMARK_MAGIC    0x20130C1D
00041 
00042 static void lfsck_bookmark_le_to_cpu(struct lfsck_bookmark *des,
00043                                      struct lfsck_bookmark *src)
00044 {
00045         des->lb_magic = le32_to_cpu(src->lb_magic);
00046         des->lb_version = le16_to_cpu(src->lb_version);
00047         des->lb_param = le16_to_cpu(src->lb_param);
00048         des->lb_speed_limit = le32_to_cpu(src->lb_speed_limit);
00049         des->lb_async_windows = le16_to_cpu(src->lb_async_windows);
00050         fid_le_to_cpu(&des->lb_lpf_fid, &src->lb_lpf_fid);
00051         fid_le_to_cpu(&des->lb_last_fid, &src->lb_last_fid);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void lfsck_bookmark_cpu_to_le(struct lfsck_bookmark *des,
00055                               struct lfsck_bookmark *src)
00056 {
00057         des->lb_magic = cpu_to_le32(src->lb_magic);
00058         des->lb_version = cpu_to_le16(src->lb_version);
00059         des->lb_param = cpu_to_le16(src->lb_param);
00060         des->lb_speed_limit = cpu_to_le32(src->lb_speed_limit);
00061         des->lb_async_windows = cpu_to_le16(src->lb_async_windows);
00062         fid_cpu_to_le(&des->lb_lpf_fid, &src->lb_lpf_fid);
00063         fid_cpu_to_le(&des->lb_last_fid, &src->lb_last_fid);
00064 }
00065 
00066 static int lfsck_bookmark_load(const struct lu_env *env,
00067                                struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00068 {
00069         loff_t pos = 0;
00070         int    len = sizeof(struct lfsck_bookmark);
00071         int    rc;
00072 
00073         rc = dt_record_read(env, lfsck->li_bookmark_obj,
00074                             lfsck_buf_get(env, &lfsck->li_bookmark_disk, len),
00075                             &pos);
00076         if (rc == 0) {
00077                 struct lfsck_bookmark *bm = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00078 
00079                 lfsck_bookmark_le_to_cpu(bm, &lfsck->li_bookmark_disk);
00080                 if (bm->lb_magic != LFSCK_BOOKMARK_MAGIC) {
00081                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: invalid lfsck_bookmark magic "
00082                               "%#x != %#x\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
00083                               bm->lb_magic, LFSCK_BOOKMARK_MAGIC);
00084                         /* Process it as new lfsck_bookmark. */
00085                         rc = -ENODATA;
00086                 }
00087         } else {
00088                 if (rc == -EFAULT && pos == 0)
00089                         /* return -ENODATA for empty lfsck_bookmark. */
00090                         rc = -ENODATA;
00091                 else
00092                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: fail to load lfsck_bookmark, "
00093                                "expected = %d: rc = %d\n",
00094                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), len, rc);
00095         }
00096         return rc;
00097 }
00098 
00099 int lfsck_bookmark_store(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00100 {
00101         struct thandle    *handle;
00102         struct dt_object  *obj    = lfsck->li_bookmark_obj;
00103         struct dt_device  *dev    = lfsck_obj2dev(obj);
00104         loff_t             pos    = 0;
00105         int                len    = sizeof(struct lfsck_bookmark);
00106         int                rc;
00107         ENTRY;
00108 
00109         lfsck_bookmark_cpu_to_le(&lfsck->li_bookmark_disk,
00110                                  &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram);
00111         handle = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00112         if (IS_ERR(handle))
00113                 GOTO(log, rc = PTR_ERR(handle));
00114 
00115         rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, obj,
00116                                      lfsck_buf_get(env,
00117                                      &lfsck->li_bookmark_disk, len),
00118                                      0, handle);
00119         if (rc != 0)
00120                 GOTO(out, rc);
00121 
00122         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, handle);
00123         if (rc != 0)
00124                 GOTO(out, rc);
00125 
00126         rc = dt_record_write(env, obj,
00127                              lfsck_buf_get(env, &lfsck->li_bookmark_disk, len),
00128                              &pos, handle);
00129 
00130         GOTO(out, rc);
00131 
00132 out:
00133         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, handle);
00134 
00135 log:
00136         if (rc != 0)
00137                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: fail to store lfsck_bookmark: rc = %d\n",
00138                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
00139         return rc;
00140 }
00141 
00142 static int lfsck_bookmark_init(const struct lu_env *env,
00143                                struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00144 {
00145         struct lfsck_bookmark *mb = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00146         int rc;
00147 
00148         memset(mb, 0, sizeof(*mb));
00149         mb->lb_magic = LFSCK_BOOKMARK_MAGIC;
00150         mb->lb_version = LFSCK_VERSION_V2;
00151         mb->lb_async_windows = LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_DEFAULT;
00152         mutex_lock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
00153         rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
00154         mutex_unlock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
00155         return rc;
00156 }
00157 
00158 int lfsck_bookmark_setup(const struct lu_env *env,
00159                          struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00160 {
00161         struct dt_object *root;
00162         struct dt_object *obj;
00163         int               rc;
00164         ENTRY;
00165 
00166         root = dt_locate(env, lfsck->li_bottom, &lfsck->li_local_root_fid);
00167         if (IS_ERR(root))
00168                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(root));
00169 
00170         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, root))) {
00171                 lfsck_object_put(env, root);
00172 
00173                 RETURN(-ENOTDIR);
00174         }
00175 
00176         obj = local_file_find_or_create(env, lfsck->li_los, root,
00177                                         LFSCK_BOOKMARK,
00178                                         S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR);
00179         lfsck_object_put(env, root);
00180         if (IS_ERR(obj))
00181                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(obj));
00182 
00183         lfsck->li_bookmark_obj = obj;
00184         rc = lfsck_bookmark_load(env, lfsck);
00185         if (rc == 0) {
00186                 struct lfsck_bookmark *mb = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00187 
00188                 /* It is upgraded from old release, set it as
00189                  * LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_DEFAULT to avoid memory pressure. */
00190                 if (unlikely(mb->lb_async_windows == 0)) {
00191                         mb->lb_async_windows = LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_DEFAULT;
00192                         mutex_lock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
00193                         rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
00194                         mutex_unlock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
00195                 }
00196         } else if (rc == -ENODATA) {
00197                 rc = lfsck_bookmark_init(env, lfsck);
00198         }
00199 
00200         RETURN(rc);
00201 }
00202 
00203 int lfsck_set_param(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00204                     struct lfsck_start *start, bool reset)
00205 {
00206         struct lfsck_bookmark   *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00207         int                      rc     = 0;
00208         bool                     dirty  = false;
00209 
00210         if (start == NULL) {
00211                 LASSERT(reset);
00212 
00213                 if (bk->lb_param & LPF_ALL_TGT) {
00214                         bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_ALL_TGT;
00215                         dirty = true;
00216                 }
00217 
00218                 if (bk->lb_param & LPF_CREATE_OSTOBJ) {
00219                         bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_CREATE_OSTOBJ;
00220                         dirty = true;
00221                 }
00222 
00223                 if (bk->lb_param & LPF_CREATE_MDTOBJ) {
00224                         bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_CREATE_MDTOBJ;
00225                         dirty = true;
00226                 }
00227 
00228                 if (bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT) {
00229                         bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_FAILOUT;
00230                         dirty = true;
00231                 }
00232 
00233                 if (bk->lb_param & LPF_DRYRUN) {
00234                         bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_DRYRUN;
00235                         dirty = true;
00236                 }
00237 
00238                 if (bk->lb_param & LPF_OST_ORPHAN) {
00239                         bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_OST_ORPHAN;
00240                         dirty = true;
00241                 }
00242 
00243                 if (__lfsck_set_speed(lfsck, LFSCK_SPEED_NO_LIMIT))
00244                         dirty = true;
00245 
00246                 if (bk->lb_async_windows != LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_DEFAULT) {
00247                         bk->lb_async_windows = LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_DEFAULT;
00248                         dirty = true;
00249                 }
00250         } else {
00251                 if ((bk->lb_param & LPF_ALL_TGT) &&
00252                     !(start->ls_flags & LPF_ALL_TGT)) {
00253                         bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_ALL_TGT;
00254                         dirty = true;
00255                 } else if (!(bk->lb_param & LPF_ALL_TGT) &&
00256                            (start->ls_flags & LPF_ALL_TGT)) {
00257                         bk->lb_param |= LPF_ALL_TGT;
00258                         dirty = true;
00259                 }
00260 
00261                 if ((start->ls_valid & LSV_CREATE_OSTOBJ) || reset) {
00262                         if ((bk->lb_param & LPF_CREATE_OSTOBJ) &&
00263                             !(start->ls_valid & LSV_CREATE_OSTOBJ)) {
00264                                 bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_CREATE_OSTOBJ;
00265                                 dirty = true;
00266                         } else if (!(bk->lb_param & LPF_CREATE_OSTOBJ) &&
00267                                    (start->ls_flags & LPF_CREATE_OSTOBJ)) {
00268                                 bk->lb_param |= LPF_CREATE_OSTOBJ;
00269                                 dirty = true;
00270                         }
00271                 }
00272 
00273                 if ((start->ls_valid & LSV_CREATE_MDTOBJ) || reset) {
00274                         if ((bk->lb_param & LPF_CREATE_MDTOBJ) &&
00275                             !(start->ls_valid & LSV_CREATE_MDTOBJ)) {
00276                                 bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_CREATE_MDTOBJ;
00277                                 dirty = true;
00278                         } else if (!(bk->lb_param & LPF_CREATE_MDTOBJ) &&
00279                                    (start->ls_flags & LPF_CREATE_MDTOBJ)) {
00280                                 bk->lb_param |= LPF_CREATE_MDTOBJ;
00281                                 dirty = true;
00282                         }
00283                 }
00284 
00285                 if ((start->ls_valid & LSV_ERROR_HANDLE) || reset) {
00286                         if ((bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT) &&
00287                             !(start->ls_valid & LSV_ERROR_HANDLE)) {
00288                                 bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_FAILOUT;
00289                                 dirty = true;
00290                         } else if (!(start->ls_flags & LPF_FAILOUT) &&
00291                                    (bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)) {
00292                                 bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_FAILOUT;
00293                                 dirty = true;
00294                         }
00295                 }
00296 
00297                 if ((start->ls_valid & LSV_DRYRUN) || reset) {
00298                         if ((bk->lb_param & LPF_DRYRUN) &&
00299                            !(start->ls_valid & LSV_DRYRUN)) {
00300                                 bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_DRYRUN;
00301                                 dirty = true;
00302                         } else if (!(start->ls_flags & LPF_DRYRUN) &&
00303                                    (bk->lb_param & LPF_DRYRUN)) {
00304                                 bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_DRYRUN;
00305                                 lfsck->li_drop_dryrun = 1;
00306                                 dirty = true;
00307                         }
00308                 }
00309 
00310                 if ((bk->lb_param & LPF_OST_ORPHAN) &&
00311                     !(start->ls_flags & LPF_OST_ORPHAN)) {
00312                         bk->lb_param &= ~LPF_OST_ORPHAN;
00313                         dirty = true;
00314                 } else if (!(bk->lb_param & LPF_OST_ORPHAN) &&
00315                            (start->ls_flags & LPF_OST_ORPHAN)) {
00316                         bk->lb_param |= LPF_OST_ORPHAN;
00317                         dirty = true;
00318                 }
00319 
00320                 if (start->ls_valid & LSV_SPEED_LIMIT) {
00321                         if (__lfsck_set_speed(lfsck, start->ls_speed_limit))
00322                                 dirty = true;
00323                 } else if (reset) {
00324                         if (__lfsck_set_speed(lfsck, LFSCK_SPEED_NO_LIMIT))
00325                                 dirty = true;
00326                 }
00327 
00328                 if (start->ls_valid & LSV_ASYNC_WINDOWS) {
00329                         if (start->ls_async_windows < 1 ||
00330                             start->ls_async_windows > LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_MAX)
00331                                 return -EINVAL;
00332 
00333                         if (bk->lb_async_windows != start->ls_async_windows) {
00334                                 bk->lb_async_windows = start->ls_async_windows;
00335                                 dirty = true;
00336                         }
00337                 } else if (reset &&
00338                            bk->lb_async_windows != LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_DEFAULT) {
00339                         bk->lb_async_windows = LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_DEFAULT;
00340                         dirty = true;
00341                 }
00342         }
00343 
00344         if (dirty)
00345                 rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
00346 
00347         return rc;
00348 }
